publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1270 Mary Scanlon: Autism Awareness Week 2004 - 17 to 24 May 2004-That the Parliament joins with The National Autistic Society Scotland, Partners in Autism and all other autism organisations in Scotland in marking Autism Awareness Week 2004; recognises the everyday challenges faced by children and adults with autistic spectrum disorders, their families and carers; further recognises the Scottish Executive's announcement of investment in services and support, focusing, in particular, on adults in the Glasgow and Edinburgh areas, and looks forward to an enhancement in services for children and adults affected by autistic spectrum disorders across Scotland. Supported by: Murdo Fraser*
S2M-1270 Autism Awareness Week 2004 - 17 to 24 May 2004 (lodged on 5 May 2004) Frances Curran*, John Swinburne*, Donald Gorrie*, Marlyn Glen*, Carolyn Leckie*
